tool_description: Performs pathway enrichment analysis on gene sets to identify significantly enriched biological pathways and molecular functions relevant for target validation.

gene_list.description: List of gene symbols or IDs for enrichment analysis

pathway_databases.description: Pathway databases to use: KEGG, GO, Reactome, WikiPathways

min_pathway_size.description: Minimum number of genes required in a pathway

error_messages: Empty gene list: Provide at least 2 genes for meaningful enrichment analysis.
Invalid pathway database: Use supported databases - KEGG, GO, Reactome, or WikiPathways.
Unsupported organism: Currently supports human, mouse, and rat organisms only.
Invalid p-value cutoff: Must be between 0.001 and 0.1 for meaningful results.
Minimum pathway size error: min_pathway_size must be between 2 and 500.
No enriched pathways: No pathways met significance criteria. Consider relaxing thresholds.
usage: Input gene_list and select pathway_databases for analysis. Specify organism and adjust statistical thresholds as needed. Returns significantly enriched pathways with statistical measures.

gene_counts.description: Number of input genes in each enriched pathway

total_pathways_tested.description: Total number of pathways tested for enrichment
